summary: - Building models using Graph analytics to identify frauds matured out of time using historical fraud transactions.

- Developed market opportunity analyzer to evaluate potential market opportunities for anti-anesthetic drugs.
- Designed and developed Spotfire-based dashboards to track KPI and generate insights for revenue estimation.
- Automated operational risk estimation to deliver an integrated stress testing framework.
- Identified opportunity areas by evaluating cross sell indexation of product exposure to clients.
